decision: Added rigor rules include directive to specify.md template
rationale: Ensures single source of truth for rigor rules and consistent enforcement across all workflow commands

decision: Added plan verification requirement before task creation
rationale: SETUP-001 rigor rule requires clear plan before tasks. Prevents scope creep and enables accurate estimates. If no plan exists, agent prompts user to run /flow:plan or provide inline plan

decision: Enforced testable acceptance criteria with examples and validation questions
rationale: SETUP-003 rigor rule ensures all ACs are specific, measurable, and atomic. Included BAD/GOOD examples and 'can I test this?' validation question. Prevents vague requirements that lead to scope disputes

decision: Required inter-task dependency documentation before ordering
rationale: SETUP-002 rigor rule prevents parallel work on dependent tasks. Added 4-step process: identify dependencies, document in metadata, verify no circular deps, order by foundation-first. Uses depends-on labels for traceability

decision: Added bead and agentic task linkage guidance with agent context templates
rationale: SETUP-004 rigor rule ensures seamless agent handoffs. Included agent context templates showing what files to read, patterns to follow, and constraints. Added label-based routing (backend/frontend) and human-review marker
